description.text: This functions as psychic crush IV, but on a successful Fortitude or Will save, the target takes 11d6 points of damage + 1 point of damage per caster level. If it is at fewer than half its total hit points, the target takes a â€“2 penalty on the Will save to resist this spell. This spell can be undercast.

sections.Saving Throw: Will partial and Fortitude partial, see text
